      • checkSnapshot

        static void checkSnapshot(INode target,
                 List<INodeDirectory> snapshottableDirs)
                   throws SnapshotException
        Check if the given INode (or one of its descendants) is snapshottable and already has snapshots.
        Parameters:
        target - The given INode
        snapshottableDirs - The list of directories that are snapshottable but do not have snapshots yet
        Throws:
        SnapshotException
